title.rendered: Qatar 2022 World Cup tickets: prices and how to buy them

content.rendered:
From Tuesday, April 5 to 28, tickets can be purchased to see both the Argentine National Team and the rest of the World Cup matches. I know what you should know.

After the fixture was defined, after the draw held in Doha on Friday, April 1, as of this Tuesday, April 5, FIFA will put into force the third ticket application process to attend the Qatar 2022 World Cup. Know what the prices are and how to buy the tickets.

Qatar 2022 World Cup tickets: prices and types of tickets

After the two sales periods that took place (one in February and the other in March), FIFA will launch a third application process from April 5, at 6, on the FIFA.com/en/tickets site. Since then, tickets can be purchased individually, a subscription for four stadiums (distances are very short) or a subscription to follow a particular team. Here are the prices:

  • Group stage ticket: $725 in category 1, $543 in category 2 and $227 in category 3.
  • Group stage ticket + round of 16: $1,027 in category 1, $770 in category 2 and $332 in category 3.
  • Full subscription: $4,314 in category 1, $2,915 in category two, and $1,616 in category three.

Qatar 2022 World Cup tickets: how much are the tickets in pesos to see the Argentine National Team

Taking the current value of the dollar and taking into account that it must be paid by card, The prices in pesos would be approximately 41,391 pesos for the payment of three games in the cheapest category, 60,537 for four games in the same sector and 294,663 pesos for those who want to ensure they can be in all the games.

If any fan is thinking of that same subscription for seven duels in category 1, they will have to pay close to 800 thousand pesos. It should be noted that the payment of the tickets granted will be made in May and these values ​​in pesos will be updated with the price of the dollar in Argentina.

When and at what time does the Argentina National Team play in the Qatar 2022 World Cup?

  • Argentina vs. Saudi Arabia | Tuesday, November 22, at 7 | Lusail Stadium.
  • Argentina vs. Mexico | Saturday, November 26, at 4:00 p.m. | Lusail Stadium.
  • Argentina vs. Poland | Wednesday, November 30, at 4:00 p.m. | Stadium 974.

Qatar 2022 World Cup tickets: how to buy them, step by step

  • one. First of all, you have to enter the FIFA official website.
  • two. Then you must select the window that says “International: order your tickets here.”
  • 3. Third, you have to log in with your account on the FIFA page or, in case you are not registered, create a new account.
  • Four. After logging in, the website will ask you to submit or edit the order for the ticket request.
  • 5. Finally, the three packages offered appear, which are: for the opening match, a season ticket for four games in different stadiums and a national team season ticket.
  • 6. After selecting your country, you will be asked whether or not to accept entries in another category. Here you have to keep in mind that the “Total price may increase/decrease if assigned a higher/lower ticket category.”
  • 7. Finally, you must read the Terms and Conditions, and Once accepted, your request will be confirmed via email.. Once the seven steps have been completed, all that remains is to wait to be drawn.

Qatar 2022 World Cup tickets: when do you know if you could buy them

Ticket applicants whose ticket applications are successful or partially successful will be notified by email not before May 31, 2022coinciding with the beginning of the payment period.
